======Makes the queen take less damage from some weapons.======

= Description =

Enables damage reductions for the queen with the following player weapons:

  * Reduces mining laser damage by 60%
  * Reduces normal shotgun damage by 40%
  * Reduces vindicator damage by 55%
  * Reduces any other damage by 80%
